alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 5:50PM EST until February 20 at 9:49AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until late Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Moderate flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 PM EST Friday the stage was 28.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:15 PM EST Friday was 28.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 29.0 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 28.6 feet on 05/10/2009. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued by Midnight tonight.
